congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Arbuckle Project Maintenance Complex and District Office Conveyance Act of 2017
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measure. Consideration began Wednesday, March 8th.<P/>H.R. 132, to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain land and appurtenances of the Arbuckle Project, Oklahoma, to the Arbuckle Master Conservancy District, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 407 yeas to 1 nay, Roll No. 159.

extension.searchTitle: AUTHORIZING THE SECRETARY OF THE INTERIOR TO AMEND THE DEFINITE PLAN REPORT FOR THE SEEDSKADEE PROJECT; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 45

congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill was passed.

titleInfo.title: RAISING A QUESTION OF THE PRIVILEGES OF THE HOUSE

extension.searchTitle: RAISING A QUESTION OF THE PRIVILEGES OF THE HOUSE; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 45

congVote.result: So the motion to table was agreed to.
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: Representative Crowley rose to a question of the privileges of the House and submitted a resolution. The Chair ruled that the resolution did not present a question of the privileges of the House. Subsequently, Representative Crowley appealed the ruling of the chair and Representative McCarthy moved to table the appeal. Agreed to the motion to table the appeal of the ruling of the Chair by a yea-and-nay vote of 223 yeas to 183 nays with 1 answering ``present'', Roll No. 161.

congVote.dailyDigestSummary: Senate confirmed the following nominations:<P/>By 85 yeas to 12 nays (Vote No. EX. 89), Daniel Coats, of Indiana, to be Director of National Intelligence.<P/>During consideration of this nomination today, Senate also took the following action:<P/>By 88 yeas to 11 nays (Vote No. 88), three-fifths of those Senators duly chosen and sworn, having voted in the affirmative, Senate agreed to the motion to close further debate on the nomination.

congVote.result: Mr. McCAIN. Mr. President, I move to reconsider the vote, and I move to table the motion to reconsider.
